Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards Settlers.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route Capacity.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Gold] Gold from killing enemy [ICON_Unit] Units from a previous [ICON_Science] Era.

[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_VisTopSecret] Spies.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_VisTopSecret] Spy operations finish 25% faster.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against [ICON_Unit] Units of enemy [ICON_Religion] Religions.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Sites [ICON_Buildings] Buildings gain +50% [ICON_Faith] Faith if there is 1) +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency and/or 2) City is at 15 [ICON_Citizen] Population or over.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Religion] Religious Strength for all [ICON_Religion] Religious Units.

[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production and +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes; doubled for international destinations.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Gold] Gold does not stack with [ICON_Policy] Abolitionist Trade.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Resource_Niter] Niter and [ICON_Resource_Coal] Coal extracted from their respective improved tiles.
[ICON_Bullet]+10 [ICON_Resource_Niter] Niter per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+15 [ICON_Resource_Coal] Coal per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus [ICON_Buildings] Buildings gain +50% [ICON_Science] Science if there is 1) +4 [ICON_Science] Science adjacency or 2) City is at 15 [ICON_Citizen] Population or over.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB] Commercial Hub [ICON_Buildings] Buildings gain +50% [ICON_Gold] Gold if there is 1) +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency or 2) City is at 15 [ICON_Citizen] Population or over.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity in all Cities; doubled in Cities with 2 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.

[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Food] Food and [ICON_Production] Production in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes with [ICON_Alliance] Allied Cities; [ICON_Alliance] allied City destinations also gain these yields.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+25% [ICON_Alliance] Alliance points growth.

[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith and +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes; doubled in international destinations.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Gold] Gold does not stack with [ICON_Policy] Triangular Trade.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Housing] Housing and [ICON_Food] Food in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +4 [ICON_Food] Food in [ICON_Buildings] Gurdwara.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Science] Science in [ICON_Buildings] Pagoda.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Culture] Culture in [ICON_Buildings] Cathedral.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture in [ICON_Buildings] Synagogue.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Food] Food, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Production] Production, [ICON_Faith] Faith, as well as +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_Buildings] Stupa.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities in all Cities.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith, as well as +8 [ICON_Gold] Gold from City-State Suzerainty.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Science] Science per Envoy sent to any existing City-State.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture per Envoy sent to any existing City-State.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General, [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer, and +4 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points per turn.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General and [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points per turn.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral and +6 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points per turn.
[ICON_Bullet]+15% [ICON_Science] Science in all Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-30% [ICON_Gold] Gold in all Cities.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Naval Raider class Units earn [ICON_GreatAdmiral] Great Admiral points and [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to 20% and 100% of a killed enemy [ICON_Unit] Unit's [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength.

[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength per unused [ICON_Movement] Movement for [ICON_Unit] Land Melee and Anti-Cavalry class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 6 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+17 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against [ICON_District] District defenses for [ICON_Unit] Naval Ranged class Units.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 6 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
